content.raw:
I can't reproduce the test failure using clang on Linux. I made the test verbose on 105475d so we can get more info from Jenkins logs.

Here's a build I had triggered before making the test verbose: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2883/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2883/)

And I triggered a new one to be verbose: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2885/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2885/)

If these pass, I think we can consider the test flaky and merge.

If at least one of them fails, I think we should decline this PR and revisit on GitHub.

Let me know what you think.
